name: Planet Unknown Runner
description:
You are a brave explorer and discoverer of new planets. Behind your shoulders you have many discoveries and adventures. You received a message from a reconnaissance drone. It's finally found a planet with useful resources. It can prevent a crisis on Earth. And here you are on the new unknown planet. All of humanity relies on you.. You have to take everything that you can take. But this planet is not as friendly as it would like to be. It seems that someone is follow youre steps. Run, run as fast as you can. Maybe you can save not only yourself, but the Earth. Maybe...

This is a traditional runner game, whose goal is to have more and more points. Run as far as you can and collect as many valuable crystals as it possible. If you take the risk of assuming this dangerous role, you will expect a unrepeatable atmosphere and a unique soundtrack.
